Recently, Momoka, @LensProtocol’s scaling solution, leveraging @ArweaveEco and @BundlrNetwork hit 100k transactions with total transaction fees under $42 🤯
Checkout this thread to see why Momoka is needed and how it works 👇 https://twitter.com/communitylabs/status/1663615852233785344

Community Labs | we're hiring!: @LensProtocol is a secure social graph that gives users complete control over their identities and creations (posts), ensuring security and ownership, while keeping itself user-friendly!
#LensProtocol #Ownership #Security
1/12 https://t.co/EdqLtQb3ew

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Polygon (Labs)
Re 5️⃣ Developer @megabyte0x, from @developer_dao, connected Sepolia, Mumbai, and Polygon zkEVM using @Hyperlane_xyz.
https://twitter.com/megabyte0x/status/1651938319570456577?s=20

Megabyte ᵍᵐ 🦥: finally after 2 weeks of deployment of @Hyperlane_xyz ⏩ on @0xPolygonLabs zkEVM 💜
I managed to run 3 relayers (zkEVM, Sepolia, Mumbai) and a validator (zkEVM) successfully.
And deployed a wrap-token and bridge it
Sepolia, Mumbai ↔️ zkEVM
Wouldn't be possible without @nambrot https://t.co/HjlkKojYKm

articles.description:
RT Sylvia R.
I wrote about Dystopias — a topic that I find both fascinating and very important.
I look into:
-- why dystopian narratives are so popular
-- what functions they serve
-- what dangers lurk in their popularity
-- and what kind of narratives we can tell if we want to encourage… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1659558727786143746 https://t.co/jtcsVHVnKI

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Michael Macaulay || micmac.eth
The only way web3 lives up to its core values is by reading data permissionlessly.
In a recent article published by @StanfordCrypto I explain the importance of using @graphprotocol for reading blockchain data & fixing the internet.
Check it out:
https://stanfordblockchainreview.substack.com/p/the-graph-reading-data-the-web3-way
